Author: ivan
Content: Seller usually send your laptop to authorized service in the UK, I think :) and you are waiting month or two to get it back. I send you an email in the evening to find right goods. Current Wii price is approx. $400 + VAT

Author: andyjenn
Content:
I attended the Startup school in March and since I'd flown 12 hours to get to SF, I thought I'd try to meet up with some companies to drum up some interest in my startup. Amazingly this ended up with me pitching (my first ever - eek!) to Barney, Ron Kaplan and Lorenzo Thiel - the main guys at Powerset

They liked my idea - not enough to give any cash though:( - and I'm on their beta testing list.

They're keen to use Powerset as platform for other applications to exploit their NLP index via APIs.

I'll update you when I get my first play with it...

P.S. Bit late Paul G, but Barney sends his regards...

Author: zx76
Title: Thoof "is an attempt to improve on sites like Digg and Reddit"

Author: rms
Content:
So Apple mandates that the sellers themselves have to repair broken hard drives? That would certainly eat away profit margins...

Apple products might not be the best thing to export from the USA to Slovenia, what about video game consoles? How much does a Wii go for?

Email me if you'd like to discuss this...
